CustomField.description: Permet de résoudre les problèmes de visibilité du bouton "nouvelle opportunité", et de réduire les conditions d'affichage sur la Lightning Page de la SAD
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(AccountType__c, 'Client'), TECH_OpportunityAuthorized__c = TRUE, OR( ISPICKVAL(PFRegion__c, 'PIBE'), ISPICKVAL(PFRegion__c, 'PILU'), Pays_SA__c = 'FRANCE' ),
BusinessLine__c = 'Meubles' ), AND( ISPICKVAL(PFRegion__c, 'PITA'), ISPICKVAL(AccountType__c, 'Prospect'), BusinessLine__c = 'Véhicules Frigorifiques', IsThereVFSAD__c = FALSE, SubmitSADForApproval__c = FALSE ), AND( ISPICKVAL(PFRegion__c, 'PITA'), TECH_OpportunityAuthorized__c = TRUE, BusinessLine__c <> 'Véhicules Frigorifiques' ), AND( ISPICKVAL(PFRegion__c, 'PITA'), TECH_OpportunityAuthorized__c = TRUE, BusinessLine__c = 'Véhicules Frigorifiques', ISPICKVAL(AccountType__c, 'Client'), SubmitSADForApproval__c = FALSE ), AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(PFRegion__c, 'PIBE'), ISPICKVAL(PFRegion__c, 'PILU'), Pays_SA__c = 'FRANCE' ),
BusinessLine__c = 'Meubles'
) ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: BypassNewOppProcess
